file_content.text: Respect the Voss way. Or the Dark Heart is denied.
I am Madaga-Ru. I appeared at the signal pyre. I appear here.
You search for someone. I know who.
He came to me. Of Voss but housing darkness, like you.
I recognize you. Another came--of Voss but housing darkness, like you.
You were the last to see him before he disappeared--so come clean.
Tell me what you did to him.
I caused no harm. I aided his journey. As I can yours.
You have very astute senses, hermit. What else do you think you know about him?
I'm impressed.
I'm hoping you know where he went.
Can you help me find him?
There is much I could tell you.
On Voss, everything gained is paid for.
You must share a secret. Any secret will do.
You have learned, nothing on Voss is free.
You avoided it before. Now you must share a secret. Any secret will do.
I don't have time for games. Tell me what you know or suffer.
I will force you to talk.
You are not the power he was. You can force nothing from me.
During my training, I disobeyed my master and severed the hand of my first overseer instead of killing him.
I spared Overseer Tremel.
On Tatooine, I was supposed to kill a Jedi Master named Yonlach, but I was merciful.
I spared an enemy's life.
On Nar Shaddaa, I was ordered to slay my old master's rival, Lord Rathari; instead, I made him my minion.
I let a rival live.
On Hoth, I allowed a legendary Jedi Master named Wyellett to love and commune with the Force.
I spared an enemy's life.
I am defying the dark side.
I walk the light path.
An admission is made. The act is payment.
There is nothing I can share with you that is sensitive or unknown.
I have no secrets.
That is its own admission. A secret you keep from yourself.
The Voss who came to you was the embodiment of the Emperor, the ruler of the Empire.
You met the Emperor's Voice.
I understand. A singularly dangerous being.
You have answered. I could not defy him. He forced from me the secrets of Voss.
You will reach your goal but before that, you will grant me a favor.
You do not dictate to me. If I do not succeed, you will suffer.
I promise nothing.
Respect the Voss way or suffer.
While on Voss, the way of Voss will rule you.
Fine. I'll play your game.
You're going to die for that.
I'm going to kill you now.
You will not, cannot. The price is paid.
How did you do that to me?
What power do you have?
I walk in the way of Voss. Everything costs. I took payment.
I promise. If you help me, I will help you.
You have my word.
Respect the Voss way and your journey will be easier.
My assistance will depend on your request.
I'll decide when we get there.
You will agree or fail. It is not a debate.
The one you seek forced me to help him unlock the secrets of Voss. I could not defy him.
He went to the Dark Heart Chamber in the Nightmare Lands. You must follow.
It would be unwise to lie to me.
This better not be a trick.
You asked for guidance. But only Voss can enter the Dark Heart.
What is the Dark Heart?
The Dark Heart is ancient. Forbidden. The secrets of Voss are buried there. The denied truth.
Why did he seek this place?
What was his purpose?
He did not answer my questions. The Dark Heart is a forbidden place. Where secrets are buried.
Your predecessor wrapped himself in the Blessing of Oneness--without it, an outsider cannot even see the gateway to the Dark Heart.
Vana-Xo can bestow the Blessing, in the Shrine of Healing. To find her, seek Fadith-Ki and complete the Voss trials.
I will break down the shrine door.
No trials.
The trials must be faced. Or your journey ends.
What does the Blessing of Oneness do?
Tell me about the Blessing.
Makes visible what is invisible. Vana-Xo is the only healer trained in it.
I have completed the Voss trials and have access to the Shrine of Healing.
Already did that.
Then you may move onward.
Sounds like I have my work cut out for me.
There's a lot to do.
The larger the need, the larger the price.
Your friend will be safe on your ship from the stars. Get the Blessing and I will guide you further.
Off. Get the Blessing at the Shrine of Healing. I will guide you when I can.
I've told you all. Follow the dark Voss's path.
Something's wrong. My body is so weak.
What did that old man do to me? I cannot move.
Master, I am unable to move.
I'm out of commission. Can't move a muscle.
We are stilled.
My lord, I cannot move.
My lord, I apologize for the interruption, but something strange just occurred. Vette collapsed and cannot be roused.
Revive my companion.
Undo this.
Nothing can. This is the price.
